scripts.deploy-to-staging: gulp clean && gulp build && publisssh ./public/build zooniverse-static/preview.zooniverse.org/chimps-staging && gulp clean
scripts.deploy-to-beta: gulp clean && gulp build && publisssh ./public/build zooniverse-static/www.chimpandsee.org/beta && gulp clean
scripts.deploy-to-production: gulp clean && gulp build && publisssh ./public/build zooniverse-static/www.chimpandsee.org --force && gulp clean
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-to-staging && npm run deploy-to-production
